articles.title: Trump Stuns: US To Share Nuclear Submarine Tech With South Korea
articles.description: In a landmark policy shift, Donald Trump announced the US will share nuclear submarine technology with South Korea. The move aims to strengthen Seoul’s naval capabilities amid rising regional threats and marks a major transformation in US defense strategy and economic cooperation.
articles.content:
17
In a highly controversial and profound alteration of US defense policy, President Donald Trump announced that, with the aid of technology from America, South Korea could build a nuclear-powered submarine.

articles.description: The British science-fiction writer Arthur C. Clarke, author of 2001: A Space Odyssey, proposed a ‘law of science’ in 1968: ‘Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.’ Clarke’s proposition had a quality of rightness, of stating the obvious with sparkling clarity, that propelled it into dictionaries of quotations.
